blogPost.excerpt: We're the #1 weekend co-working club for bootstrappers to stay motivated, get helpful feedback and ship your project faster. Live sessions Saturdays 10am-5pm GMT & US Central time with a dedicated host, run over Slack & Zoom. Plus 100+ software discounts. 🤯
blogPost.body: We're the #1 weekend co-working club for bootstrappers to stay motivated, get helpful feedback and ship your project faster. Live sessions Saturdays 10am-5pm GMT & US Central time with a dedicated host, run over Slack & Zoom. Plus 100+ software discounts. 🤯
blogPost.title: Weekend Club - The weekend co-working club for bootstrappers to ship faster
blogPost.author: Charlie Ward

localize.description: 我们是引导者的第一周末联合办公俱乐部，让你保持积极性，得到有用的反馈，更快地完成项目。每周六格林威治标准时间和美国中部时间上午10点到下午5点，由专门的主持人通过Slack和Zoom进行实时会话。加上100+软件折扣。🤯
localize.tagline: 周末联合办公俱乐部，让引导者更快地出货。

localize.description: 我們是引導者的第一週末聯合辦公俱樂部，讓你保持積極性，得到有用的反饋，更快地完成項目。每週六格林威治標準時間和美國中部時間上午10點到下午5點，由專門的主持人通過Slack和Zoom進行實時會話。加上100+軟件折扣。🤯
localize.tagline: 週末聯合辦公俱樂部，讓引導者更快地出貨。

previous.excerpt: Product management can seem like a daunting discipline, but once you get a grasp of the fundamentals, and combine that with some intuition, you’ll be on your way to leading successful projects.
previous.title: Product Manager's Guide - A product manager guide from product vision to product road

localize.description: 产品管理似乎是一门令人望而生畏的学科，但一旦你掌握了基本原理，再结合一些直觉，你就会走上成功领导项目的道路。
localize.tagline: 从产品愿景到产品之路的产品经理指南。

localize.description: 產品管理似乎是一門令人望而生畏的學科，但一旦你掌握了基本原理，再結合一些直覺，你就會走上成功領導項目的道路。
localize.tagline: 從產品願景到產品之路的產品經理指南。
